name: vite-typescript-tailwindcss-p5js-boilerplate
author: Fujii Web Works <info@fujii-web.works> (https://github.com/FujiiWebWorks)
description: A minimal and ready-to-use boilerplate for creating interactive web site with Vite, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and p5.js. This project provides a streamlined setup, allowing you to focus on building creative and engaging web experiences.
